Articles.Content:
Hi All,

Here's a small suggestion for the newly implemented subassembly manager, categories or folders so it is possible to organize subassemblies, like with the mod 'subassembly manager' that was used for the same thing prior to the release KSP 0.22. I know its a little OCD but personally I find categorizing stuff easier to navigate and search through.

Kind Regards,

ReconXPanzer
